name: equilibre.io
description: A portfolio balancer for Stellar Decentralized Exchange
author: MisterTicot

scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.build-misc: cp -f AUTHORS LICENSE README.md CHANGELOG.md package-lock.json web
scripts.build: npm run clean && for i in i18n js css static misc; do npm run build-$i || return; done
scripts.rebuild: npm run get && cp -f web/package-lock.json . && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.check: npm run rebuild && cd web && git status
scripts.watch: npm run watch-static && npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
scripts.serve: npm run watch & cd web && live-server --https=../node_modules/live-server-https --no-browser
scripts.commit-all: [ "$version" ] && npm run commit-web && npm run commit-main
scripts.tag-all: [ "$version" -a "$message" ] && npm run tag-web && npm run tag-main
scripts.tag-release: export version message="Release $version" && npm run tag-all
scripts.push-release: cd web && git push && git push --tags && cd .. && git push && git push --tags
scripts.make-release: npm update && npm run build && npm run commit-release
scripts.publish-release: npm run check && npm run tag-release && npm run push-release
